text: 'my feelings are hurt and i need time to process them so i can better communicate with you' is perfectly valid response & i wish we used it more in moments of conflict
day by day, i'm training my heart to accept disappointments even from people i love
my mom didn't raise a quitter, she raised someone so afraid of failure that they don't even start something
so far, september has not been good to me

manipulation is when they
blame you for your reaction to
their toxic behavior, but never
discuss the disrespect that
triggered you.
i can't even describe what i'm feeling right now, all i can say is that, it hurts a lot.

no matter how many friends i will have, i will always remember that circle of friends who made me feel that i belong, that would always ask me if i can go in some trip, that circle who stays and wait for me when i tie my shoelaces.
i'm sick of finding myself at the same place again and again.
don't beg for replies and attention, if someone is ignoring you just maintain the distance and treat them as they treat you.

if they knew how much time, effort, and tears it takes to rebuild, they would understand why we have to be careful when choosing who enters our lives and who doesn't. sometimes there are people who don't mind breaking our souls and leaving empty spaces that are difficult to fill

i usually ignore people when i'm having breakdowns. i appreciate those who still stays, who still patiently waiting for me to respond to their messages. those who always tell me that i'm not alone. those people that can understand my feelings even if i'm not saying anything.
if someone wants you, nothing can keep them away. if they don't want you, nothing can make them stay. remember that
never force friendships, relationships or communication. if it's not mutual, then let it go.
you gotta stay away from people that know they be doing fucked up shit to you, then be trying to play you like you crazy or doing too much when you acknowledge shit
i got 3 rules. don't líe to me, don't use me, and if you're tíred of me, leave me alone
how i wish
my eyes beg me to sleep but i'm stuck in the silent war between my own mind and my heart.

i'm not the type of person to give up on someone. yes, sometimes i get really mad and upset so i need a minute to cool off but I'll never abandon you. i don't leave people. and i think that's why it hurts so bad when people leave me.
i hate when people can't see the wrong in their actions, but see the wrong in yours.
no offense but if someone is excited about something and you make them feel stupid for being excited about it you are the worse type of person
nothing hurts more than seeing myself again in the same situation after getting better for a while
"it's not that deep" is insane because these are my feelings not yours
can we just admit that we all lost a bond with someone this year that we wanted to last forever
sometimes, no matter how nice you are. how kind you are. how caring you are and how loving you are, it just isn't enough for some people

i think one of the healthiest things i've ever learned is that you should allow others to reintroduce themselves to you. give people space to become who they are without assuming you know who they are just bc you've been friends or family for years
i would just like a little credit for the fact that i'm killing myself trying.
the lack of interest i have in everyone and everything nowadays is insane

one thing i absolutely love and adore about myself is, no matter how bad i've been treated, no matter how i'm feeling, no matter what i've been through or what i'm going through, i still have a heart of gold and endless love to give. that's one thing no one can ever take from me.

i'm teaching myself to not exaggerate my places in peoples lives. no matter how good my intentions, no matter how much they mean to me. i'm learning that sometimes you don't mean to people what they mean to you & that's okay.
DON'T overshare just because someone is being nice to you. you idiot
i don't cry over people, i cry over the way i get treated because i don't deserve that
to be treated well without asking for it, hits different
hearing "i'm proud of you" when you're having a hard time really does hit different
people be abusing that soft spot you got for them, until it's no longer there
i stopped looking so deeply into people when i realized that they don't even go that far into themselves
"are you okay?" no, from the bottom of my heart, i'm tired.
i am a strong person. but every once in a while i would like someone to hold my hand and tell me things are going to be OK
it didn't kill me, but a part of me died that day.
maybe i'm not that strong, but i'm trying, i'm really trying.
god, please make my heart strong enough to handle every struggle.
i love being spoiled, but not with gift or money, just time attention and efforts
i don't know what's going on in my life, but i'm slowly losing interest in everything."

i don't cheat and not because i can't, but because i don't want to be a reason someone stops believing in love. i don't want to be the reason someone stay awake all night crying. i'm not saying i'm perfect, but i just realized that at this age cheating is immature and disgusting.

if i ever lose my battle to my mental health know that i fought. know
that i tried.
when their only excuse for their actions was "i'm just going through a lot rn" but when i was going through a lot, i never treated them that bad
